scripts.install: yarn install:app && yarn install:api && yarn install:contracts && yarn install:chainlink:node && yarn install:chainlink:adapters
scripts.install:app: git clone https://github.com/octobay/app && cd app && yarn && cp .env.sample .env
scripts.install:api: git clone https://github.com/octobay/api && cd api && yarn && cp .env.sample .env
scripts.install:contracts: git clone https://github.com/octobay/contracts && cd contracts && yarn && cp .env.sample .env
scripts.install:chainlink:node: git clone https://github.com/smartcontractkit/chainlink && cd chainlink && git checkout tags/v0.9.4 && make install && cp ./../.env.chainlink.sample .env && cp ./../.chainlink-api-login .api-login && cp ./../.chainlink-node-account-password .node-account-password
scripts.install:chainlink:adapters: git clone https://github.com/octobay/chainlink-adapters && cd chainlink-adapters && yarn && cp .env.sample .env && cp -rf jobs ./../.jobs
scripts.evm:deploy: rm -rf contracts/build/contracts && node pre-deploy && cd contracts && truffle migrate --f 1 --to 3 --network development && cd .. && yarn chainlink:jobs:create && cd contracts && truffle migrate --f 4 --to 6 --network development && cd .. && node post-deploy
scripts.chainlink:adapters: node configure-adapters && cd chainlink-adapters && yarn start
scripts.git:status: git status && cd api && git status && cd ../app && git status && cd ../contracts && git status && cd ../chainlink-adapters && git status
